languages.text: {n}Сенешаль проводит рукой по лицу.{/n} "Сначала — предательство, теперь — убийство {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}... и Морта!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Сенешаль проводит рукой по лицу.{/n} "Сначала — предательство, теперь — убийство {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}... и Морта!"

languages.text: {n}Abelard runs his hand over his face.{/n} "First, betrayal, now the murder of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}... and Mort!"
languages.original_text: {n}Сенешаль проводит рукой по лицу.{/n} "Сначала — предательство, теперь — убийство {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}... и Морта!"

{n}Abelard runs his hand over his face.{/n} "First, betrayal, now the murder of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}... and Mort!"

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德捂住了脸。{/n}“先是背叛，现在又谋杀了{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}……和莫特！”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard runs his hand over his face.{/n} "First, betrayal, now the murder of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}... and Mort!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德捂住了脸。{/n}“先是背叛，现在又谋杀了{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}……和莫特！”

languages.text: {n}Abelard se lleva la mano a la cara.{/n} «Primero traición y ahora el asesinato de la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}... ¡y de Mort!».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard runs his hand over his face.{/n} "First, betrayal, now the murder of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}... and Mort!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard se lleva la mano a la cara.{/n} «Primero traición y ahora el asesinato de la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}... ¡y de Mort!».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは顔を素早く手で拭う。{/n}「最初は裏切りだった。今度は{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}様と…モートの殺害だ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard runs his hand over his face.{/n} "First, betrayal, now the murder of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}... and Mort!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは顔を素早く手で拭う。{/n}「最初は裏切りだった。今度は{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の殺害だ…そしてモートも殺られた！」
{n}アベラルドは顔を素早く手で拭う。{/n}「最初は裏切りだった。今度は{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}様と…モートの殺害だ！」

languages.text: {n}Abélard se passe la main sur le visage.{/n} « D'abord, la trahison et maintenant, le meurtre de la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g}... et de Mort ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard runs his hand over his face.{/n} "First, betrayal, now the murder of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}... and Mort!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard se passe la main sur le visage.{/n} « D'abord, la trahison et maintenant, le meurtre de la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g}... et de Mort ! »

languages.text: {n}Abelard birgt sein Gesicht in einer Hand.{/n} "Erst der Verrat, jetzt der Mord an der {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} ... und Mort!"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard runs his hand over his face.{/n} "First, betrayal, now the murder of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}... and Mort!"

languages.original_text: {n}Abelard runs his hand over his face.{/n} "First, betrayal, now the murder of the Rogue Trader... and Mort!"

languages.text: {n}Abelard, yüzünü ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Önce ihanet, şimdi de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} ve Mort'un katli!"
